paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the BRCA2 gene along with penetrance data from the study on familial breast cancer in Chinese families.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: BRCA2 p.Glu97Term was found in a family with 2 BC patients.
BRCA2 p.Glu97Term was found in a family with 2 BC patients.

functional_data.summary: The mutation is located in a region that interacts with the DSS1 protein, which is required for normal cell growth.

variants.segregation_data: The mutation segregates with disease in the family.
variants.evidence_level: likely pathogenic based on family history and functional impact.
variants.additional_notes: The mutation was found in a family with multiple breast cancer cases.
key_quotes: BRCA2 p.Glu97Term was found in a family with 2 BC patients.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: BRCA2 p.Arg2520Term was located in the helical domain of BRCA2.

individual_records.phenotype_details: contralateral breast cancer diagnosed at age 42 after initial diagnosis at age 35
individual_records.evidence_sentence: BRCA2 p.Arg2520Term was located in the helical domain of BRCA2.

functional_data.summary: The mutation is located in the helical domain of BRCA2, which is critical for its function.

variants.segregation_data: The mutation segregates with disease in the family.
variants.evidence_level: likely pathogenic based on family history and functional impact.
variants.additional_notes: The mutation was found in a family with multiple breast cancer cases.
